pageContext.claim: “The Amazon Washington Post did a story that I brought racist attacks against the 'Squad.”'No, they brought racist attacks against our Nation. All I do is call them out for the horrible things they have said. The Democrats have become the Party of the Squad!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be referring to an article titled: "Trump’s lost summer: Aides claim victory, but others see incompetence and intolerance." It factually stated that he made racist attacks against four female lawmakers of color, and he tries to turn it around by falsely saying they are racist. The Washington Post is owned by Jeffrey P. Bezos, who also, separately, owns Amazon. The Post does not lobby on behalf of Amazon.
